english.segment1: You are the hero, ill never be. but don't You know, I wanna be like You. and I'm so glad You're a part of me. ill go with You wherever You want to
english.segment2: You came to save me from myself. You took the blame (shame). You love me like nobody else. so I say.
english.segment3: (chorus). now and forever. I'm with You. wherever You lead me, ill go too. we'll be together. I know its true. now I know that You are. You are forever in my heart
english.segment4: and when I think about all You've done. You know its hard for me to believe it. and when I see all the love You give. I can't deny it, I gladly receive it
english.segment5: (chorus). who can do everything that You've done
english.segment6: who can love in the way that You love. You are forever in my heart.
